data.title: – Ayesha Faridi
data.text:
Saurabh Mukherjea has issued the red alert that NBFC and consumption stocks are in take-off mode and that we have to board them ASAP. He has given clear-cut advice about which stocks we should back

Hiren Ved of Alchemy Capital has joined the long list of luminaries and advised that the present crisis is a ‘once-in-a-lifetime’ opportunity that we cannot afford to miss. Simultaneously, Bill Ackman has announced that he has already invested $2.5 Billion on a “recovery bet”

Vijay Kedia has fairly admitted that his stock recommendations have not fared as well as expected. However, he has expressed confidence in the stocks and opined that they will also sparkle some day soon and deliver hefty gains to investors

Stock Wizard Manish Chokhani has opined that the valuations at which some stocks are quoting is a “travesty”. He has advised that we take advantage of the anomaly and grab these stocks ASAP

Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman’s radical reforms have turned the tables on the Bears and cleared the path for the Bulls to take charge of Dalal Street. Experts have opined that these reforms will unleash “Animal Spirits” and usher in the “Mother of all Bull markets“. We have to urgently identify the stocks which will benefit from the reforms and grab them ASAP

Vijay Kedia, who has the stellar reputation of having discovered 30 100-bagger stocks in the course of his illustrious investing career, has sent the clarion call that we should all now rush to Dalal Street and scoop up potential multibagger stocks at bargain basement prices

A phalanx of ten top stock pickers has recommended ten top-quality stocks for us to buy now. These are ideal “buy and forget” stocks which will effortlessly compound our wealth over the next 10 years and longer

Basant Maheshwari has made the shocking revelation that he has got “fed up” of the HFC stocks which were earlier described as “blind buys“. He has revealed the new stocks that he is now bullish about

Sanjiv Bhasin, the veteran stock market expert, has homed in on a stock which is likely to blossom into the “next HDFC Bank“. He has described it as a “huge wealth creating opportunity” and advised us to aggressively tuck into the stock

Shankar Sharma has fulfilled his bounden duty to us by recommending a high-quality fail-safe blue-chip stock for 2019. He has also outlined the strategies that we have to adopt to rake in multibagger gains
